<script>
(function() {
  function countItems() {
    // ç›´æ¥æ‰«æé¡µé¢ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰é“¾æ¥ï¼ŒæŒ‰è·¯å¾„åˆ†ç±»ç»Ÿè®¡
    var allLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[href]');
    
    var worldviewSet = new Set();
    var charactersSet = new Set();
    var keyplotsSet = new Set();
    var chaptersSet = new Set();
    
    allLinks.forEach(function(link) {
      var href = link.href || '';
      var text = link.textContent.trim();
      
      // åªç»Ÿè®¡æœ‰å®é™…å†…å®¹çš„é“¾æ¥
      if (text.length < 3) return;
      
      if (href.includes('posts/novel/worldview') || href.includes('novel/worldview')) {
        worldviewSet.add(href);
      } else if (href.includes('posts/novel/characters') || href.includes('novel/characters')) {
        charactersSet.add(href);
      } else if (href.includes('posts/novel/keyplots') || href.includes('novel/keyplots')) {
        keyplotsSet.add(href);
      } else if (href.includes('posts/novel/chapters') || href.includes('novel/chapters')) {
        chaptersSet.add(href);
      }
    });
    
    console.log('Novel scan results:', {
      worldview: worldviewSet.size,
      characters: charactersSet.size,
      keyplots: keyplotsSet.size,
      chapters: chaptersSet.size
    });
    
    var el1 = document.getElementById('worldview-count');
    var el2 = document.getElementById('characters-count');
    var el3 = document.getElementById('keyplots-count');
    var el4 = document.getElementById('chapters-count');
    
    if (el1) el1.textContent = worldviewSet.size;
    if (el2) el2.textContent = charactersSet.size;
    if (el3) el3.textContent = keyplotsSet.size;
    if (el4) el4.textContent = chaptersSet.size;
  }
  
  // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½åå¤šæ¬¡å°è¯•
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(countItems, 300);
    setTimeout(countItems, 1000);
  } else {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() {
      setTimeout(countItems, 300);
      setTimeout(countItems, 1000);
    });
  }
})();
</script>
